experience.title: Web Development Intern at Chucklebyte Technologies
responsibility: Description: Developed an e-commerce website using the MERN stack with features such as login, sign-up, home page, product page, cart page, and search functionality. Implemented global state management using React hooks such as useState, useEffect, and useContext.

Highlights: Used MongoDB for data storage (product details, user data), Node.js and Express.js for backend development. Completed 2 major tasks focused on developing a responsive landing page using React, Material UI, and Framer Motion.
Proficient in: React.js, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Material UI, Redux Toolkit, Jest, Framer Motion.

experience.title: Python Programming Intern at YBI Foundation
responsibility: Description: Developed a model to identify at-risk customers using SVC and Gradient Boosting. Conducted data preprocessing and feature engineering.
Highlights: Completed 13 modules and 35 chapters mastering Python data analysis and machine learning.
Proficient in Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, Matplotlib, and Seaborn.

projects.name: BRUTON Technologies Landing Page
projects.description: Developed a responsive landing page for BRUTON Technologies, a software development and cybersecurity company, focusing on performance optimization and seamless user experience.
highlights: Built the landing page using React.js and Material UI for modern and clean design.
Implemented animations using Framer Motion to enhance user interaction and engagement.
Used Redux Toolkit for state management, ensuring smooth data handling across components.
Increased performance by 20% through lazy loading and memoization techniques.

projects.name: Chucklebyte E-commerce Project
projects.description: Developed an e-commerce website using the MERN stack for Chucklebyte Technologies, enabling seamless online shopping with user-friendly navigation and optimized performance.
highlights: Implemented a login, sign-up, product listing, search, and cart functionality using React.js, MongoDB, Node.js, and Express.js.
Integrated global state management using React hooks (useState, useEffect, useContext) for efficient data handling.
Utilized MongoDB for storing product data and user information with optimized query handling.
Achieved a 25% faster loading time through lazy loading and component memoization.

projects.name: MyPortfolio
projects.description: Developed a personal portfolio website to showcase projects, skills, and experiences, enhancing my professional digital presence.
highlights: Designed and built the front-end using React.js, focusing on responsiveness and clean UI/UX.
Integrated email service using Node.js and Nodemailer for contact form functionality.
Deployed on Netlify for fast and secure access, handling over 500 monthly visitors.
Optimized the site for speed and SEO, improving performance scores by 40%.

projects.name: HealthChain
projects.description: Launched a secure blockchain-powered website for patient health records ensuring enhanced data protection and transparency.
highlights: Developed a front-end using React.js for user interaction
Integrated secure data transactions with Ethereum test net and MetaMask handling over 10,000 transactions monthly.
Developed robust smart contracts in Solidity to ensure secure data handling
resulting in a 50% reduction in data compromise incidents and a 30% improvement in processing efficiency.

projects.name: Diabetes and Heart Disease Prediction
projects.description: Engineered a predictive analytics web application using Django framework, increasing forecasting accuracy by 25% and reducing manual data processing time by 40%.
highlights: Implemented machine learning algorithms (Random Forest) to achieve 85% prediction accuracy.
Utilized MongoDB for efficient data storage and management, reducing query time by 30%.
